understanding.developer_understanding_on_unclear_metho: The unclear code is a method named getInternodeApplicationSendQueueCapacityInBytes which returns a value from a configuration variable conf.internode_application_send_queue_capacity_in_bytes.
understanding.developer_understanding_on_unclear_code_: The unclear code is directly related to the configuration description provided. It is used to retrieve the internode application send queue capacity in bytes from the configuration, which is a global limit imposed on messages queued for delivery to other nodes in the cluster.

config_description: Global, per-endpoint and per-connection limits imposed on messages queued for delivery to other nodes and waiting to be processed on arrival from other nodes in the cluster.  These limits are applied to the on-wire size of the message being sent or received.  The basic per-link limit is consumed in isolation before any endpoint or global limit is imposed. Each node-pair has three links: urgent, small and large.  So any given node may have a maximum of N*3*(internode_application_send_queue_capacity_in_bytes+internode_application_receive_queue_capacity_in_bytes) messages queued without any coordination between them although in practice, with token-aware routing, only RF*tokens nodes should need to communicate with significant bandwidth.  The per-endpoint limit is imposed on all messages exceeding the per-link limit, simultaneously with the global limit, on all links to or from a single node in the cluster. The global limit is imposed on all messages exceeding the per-link limit, simultaneously with the per-endpoint limit, on all links to or from any node in the cluster.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration option 'internode_application_send_queue_capacity_in_bytes' is a method that returns the value of the send queue capacity in bytes. It checks if the value is not null, it returns the value, otherwise it retrieves the value from the DatabaseDescriptor.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the 'internode_application_send_queue_capacity_in_bytes' configuration depends on the usage of the method 'applicationSendQueueCapacityInBytes'. It will be triggered whenever this method is called in the code.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The 'internode_application_send_queue_capacity_in_bytes' configuration option sets the limit on the size of messages queued for delivery to other nodes in the cluster. It impacts the amount of memory allocated for message queues and can affect the overall performance and resource usage of the system.
